values: Anne Marie makes really yummy cupcakes... im going to go have another HOLY SHIT I GOT THE CLASS I WANTED AT FAU!

my birthdays tomorrow. not excited all of a sudden, in fact i'm feeling really depressed, the same way i felt last year and the year before. i don't know why, other than the fact that everyone forgets my birthday... every year... I just want one person to remember and suprise me and be thankful that i was born... that probably came off as being conceited and stuff, but look at it through my point of view. I have low self-esteem and a fluctuating mood I have no control over... o yea plus I'm extremely sensitive and have emotions that tend to go on overdrive... You think I can contol but that my friend you are mistaken. Now I sign off and go sing happy birthday to my self as i cry myself to sleep.

Happy birthday to me Happy birthday to me Happy birthday to me-e Happy birthday to me...

happy birthday, emo kid.

1. School starts wednesday and i still haven't done my 4 outlines for AP english... much less read the 4th book.

2. My birthday is in 9 days. Probably won't do anything because I have no friends.
TONY, I MISS YOU. WHERE ARE YOUUUUUUUUUUUUUU

my eyes are starting to feel better. the blister in my right eye isn't so bad anymore. so that my friends, is a very good thing. 

i feel like i have dropped off the face of the planet. i'm simply falling... and falling... and falling... and falling... and falling...and falling...............

I leave for New York soon... thursday to be exact. Im excited. Mentally. Not physically. 










is this real anymore?
i have pink eye in both eyes:( it hurts.

This is a record for me i have watched 7 movies in a week. they are: anchorman, i robot, mona lisa smile, 50 first dates, secret window, kill bill vol 1, starsky and hutch. all but anchorman are awesome movies. Tomorrow i'm going to watch the butterfly effect with rick possibly, he told me to save it for him, so while i wait for him to call me tomorrow im going to return mona lisa smile and 50 first dates and get 2 more movies to watch. w00t. I'm trying to catch up on all the movies I never saw. My mom got me unlimited movies for a month so im going to see as many as I can. Its been awesome having rick home, but he leaves thursday morning:( The good thing about that is I won't have anymore bite marks on me... I guess he won't either;) We are a violent pair... Joe, ricks brother always finds us in contorted posistions (joe calls it weird kamasutra) where we are laughing, slapping, hitting, and notoriously biting each other. good times, good times. Im going to miss that, so if I come up and bite you, im sorry but i cannot help it. I bite. I'm teething, and unfortunatly it is going to last a long time. I always have to have something in my mouth ( eww and not in that way sicko) right now it is my lip, which might i have is bleeding b/c i keep biting and sucking on it... ooooooooops. my bad. anyway, im bored. i'll update sooon. oh yeah, i have my senior pix tomorrow... they are going to be horrible. my school pix always are. whens brittany going to be back?!?! Camille we gotta make out t-shirts! ok. peace out.

I'm home! Yay! Back to air conditioning, warm water, my own cozy bed, my dogs, my friends, my family, standard key board, and well... normality. Now I just need to unpack... that could take awhile... I have a lot of crap packed. And i have a cold... stupid tica colds... grr.
Happy 17th Birthday to my Sara/3 <3 And Happy early 17th Birthday to Sarah/3 <3 And Happy one month early b-day to myself... thats right... my birthday is one month from today... aug. 18th. i'll turn 17. kinda weird considering I look like im 12... maybe i'll turn 13 this year... 
Can some one show me how to put pictures on livejournal?? I have so many from Costa Rica.... 
ok well i'm gonna go start unpacking. and rix coming over soon. w0ot. 
<3, Cari

hey guys... i;ve been in costa rica for 4 days... i don't have time to write anything but... i miss u all... and thank you for those who made my last day special. um... yea so i'll see you guys july 17th. have a good summer if i don't talk to you. 
hasta luego, si dios quiere
<3, Cari
I'm donna take my ciesta... i've been up since 6 am.

I've been haning with Tony all week... he's really cool and I enjoy his company. Last night I went to the movies with my bro to see the Phish concert live. it was soooo awesome.... there were people dancing and singing all over the theatre and people were smoking pot in the theatre it was so much fun! all in all it was a great experience. I started and almost finished packing today because I leave tomorrow morning for Costa Rica for a month, i'm pretty excited yet nervous.... i'll be staying with a family i've never met and the school i'm going to down there doesn't start until monday so i'll be stuck alone with the family for almost 3 days... and on top of that, i'm not sure how comfortable i am with the figgin language, hence the fact i'm down there. any who, i'm gonna go party it up and what not. i would like to write u all a letter (via e-mail or a hand written letter) so if u give me ur address (home or e-mail) i'll try to write u... or get to an internet cafe to update my journal. well, I'll see you all in a month! take care, i hope all goes well. I'll miss you all!!!!

So I'm back...5 days later. My cousin, Tripp, is 4 weeks old, and is the most precious thing I've ever seen. He truly is, I'm not even saying that because he's my cousin. I babysat him a lot which was fun. I nicknamed him Squirt b/c he does that a lot... u feed him, u birp him then...SQUIRT... he spits up... kinda funny actually. any way... where my uncle lives is in the Martin Luther King District... an almost all black neighborhood in which 4 houses down from theirs is a crack house and a few blocks away is the red light district (for those of u who don't know what that is... its where all the black prostitute or "dem hoes" stand waiting for a customer...) I found the most awesome store on the face of the planet. It is my Mecca. Its called Loose Lucy's, its a hippie shop with really awesome clothes. I got a bunch of stuff. My Uncle is the announcer for the Charleston River Dog, a minor league baseball team with a lot of hot guys that are relatively younge. At one of the games I picked out my favorite players (hehehe) which were numbers 7,8, and 9. The next day at the game number 8 was up in the booth where my Uncle was sitting before the game getting his stuff in order and number 8 goes to my uncle and I quote says "Who was that hot little thing with that lady you were talking to last night" when my unlce told me that i was like "YOU BLEW IT!" this kid was only 18 and worth a couple million... damn... o well... im over it. My mom and I were talking about my horrible comp cards (for modeling) that are now like 3 or 4 years old with my aunt... a friend of hers is a model. my aunt took one of my cards to her and her friend wants to take my card with her when she moves to atlanta, ga and give it to her agency which does work in charleston, sc, atlanta, ga, and all over california! i'm so excited! Cari's going nation wide! on the way home today my mom and i stopped at an outlet mall. we went to the "music 4 less" store and i finally got the new hanson cd... which might i add is quite good... and i got an older one for 4.99... awesomeness... ok... thats all for now.

I am not this kinda monkey! I'd like to have this monkey... but i am not a geeky monkey!:
Geeky Monkey

So yesterday (tuesday) i had my popped blood vessel removed finally... now theres a purple spot there... the color of an eggplant... i look like nelly b/c i have a bandaide on it. so i had my lil shindig 2day. of course not everyone that said they were coming showed up. i'll be honest it pissed me off. to the 9 of u that actually came: thanks! i had a blast. we swam (well... adam and i did) ate pizza and other stuff... played halo (well... matt and harrison (my brothers) played against adam (dragon) and humberto (stumpy)) that was really funny actually... I eventually found my ddr cd and so we hooked up our (adam and I's) ddr (dance dance revolution) mats. it was soooooo funny. camille is so cute! she looks like a lil raptor when she dances... her dances look like a combination between an irish jig and a disco. her right arm always springs up into the air... don't worry we have it on tape. im so exhausted from all the dancing. Adam - i kicked your ass and u know it!! anyway... i had an awesome time and were doing it again some time before i leave for costa rica (billy its Coh-sta Rica not Cost-a Rica!) Rick called, he was being all pissy... grrr... so i told him i'd call him 2morrow b/c he was puting me in a bad rude and that i was being rude to the people who were at my house, that made him a lil pissier. argh. Anyway... i need to put away the ddr mat before my brother spazzez again. l8r dayz.

Who - EVERYBODY What - PICNIC/ BASEBALL-SOCCER-FOOTBALL GAME/ SWIMMING AND MORE When - WEDNESDAY (6/02) AT 4:30-WHENEVER Where - MY HOUSE Why - B/C I SAID SO CALL ME TO LEMME KNOW YOUR COMING SO I CAN CALL YOU IN THE GATE... 213-1677 oh and if u need a ride... thats no excuse not to come... i drive... ur mom and dad drive... ur friend drives... so be there.

Sunday: Went to the beach near my brother's in Delray and then to his bbq. i wanted to go to the RIB show at surf cafe... but i couldn't:( I hear they rocked so w00t for them:)

Monday: today.... I went to the mall with my mom. she bought me clothes for the first time in while... i got 2 new bathing suits (these bathing suites make me look like i have boobs!! and they aren't even padded!!) that made me happy lol. And I got 4 pairs of shorts (for costa rica... its really hot there... and i don't really have a lot of shorts) and i got a new belly button ring and a new ring for my tragus. then... I went over to paul and joel's house where we danced (or tried to dance lol paul) played the organ, played the guitar and drums, and tought sara <3 the bass (b-a-s-e... phonetics...not to be confused with the fish) C C C C B B B B A A A A A A A A get ready get ready for meeeeeEEEEEEEEEEEEeeeeeeeeeee YEA! It was a lot of fun at their house. 

For the past few days I have been addicted to Sim Tower... some of you are aware of this lol. I've made to 5 stars!! (the max is 5 stars...) and i have like $15 million and 12,000 people. All I need is 3,000 more people to be in my building and then i'll be considered a tower:)I've already had 2 or 3 fires, multiple bomb threats and one bomb blow up... i have a cathedral at the top of my building on the 100th floor. my building is awesome. anywho... i'm sleepy and its only 8:58... once someone teaches me how to put pix in these entries i'll put pix in... okie? okie. CIAO!

Yea. one more day of school. i just don't feel like doing anything anymore. nothing seems to excite me anymore. everything pretty much just sucks. i feel like i have no friends (with an exception of a few ppl: sara and sarah who i know will always be there i <3 u guys, and beth u are truly awesome). no one ever calls me... i'm sick of calling people because i'm tired of their excuses. i feel like everyone just laughs at me. i feel like theres some big secret about me that everyone but me knows... i'm sick and tired of excuses in general i guess, because every excuse means the same damn thing essentially. if u don't want to be hang out, if u don't want to be my friend just fucking tell me!

So everything is once again smoothing out. I am content with certain end results (someone knows what i am talking about). But I have one last question. What did you ever see in me? Did you see anything at all? Or was I just something to look at and hold? On a lighter note, 1st period and 2nd period have been completed.... w00t no more Chemistry and Spanish 3! I did absolutly horrible on chemistry and awesome on spanish...(happy dance for spanish) I have English and Drama tomorrow... I don't know what Mrs. Ruben will have us do... probably some long ass writting assignment on knowing your character and making up a character from little information... I sense its going to be something like that (right Beth?) Before I forget (I have a memory of a goldfish) I'd like to give a (mental) hug to Sara, Sarah, Beth, and Billy who have been the greatest friends anyone could ask for... ok... well i'm hungry and tired so i'm going to go now. ciao! -3/gwtbg

So the past few days have been a roller coaster... i usually like roller coasters... but this one wasn't so great... i got whip lash metaphorically speaking. Atleast I got my friend back. That made everything pretty much better. I failed my math exam today Plus I had a B/C split I found out afterwards... thank you mr. fucking moreland! I have chem and spanish III tomorrow... i actually studied for an hour! w00t! ok... i'm sleepie.... this is Cari and i'm signing off. Ciao!

you love some one so much it makes you cry. you love that someone so much you would die for them. but one day something happens, a big mistake, you cheat on that one person who means everything to you. well you tell this person and they forgive you because it was a mistake, no ones perfect. but later you find out this person has been cheating on you a lot worse... what are you to do?! You love this person so incredibly much... so u forgive them... but then it dons on you... yea its a mistake but if the two of you love each other so incredibly much... you have no excuse to cheat on each other... you love them... but...why? you meet someone new, they are totally awesome... they are funny, down to earth, easy to talk to, just really a cool person... and good things happen between you.. but then the next two days... you just want to cry... it basically boils down to that they don't know you like they think. there is stuff deep down they would never expect and a whole new side of you appears. at this moment you look them in the eye and get your things and say good-bye. you drive home and wonder what just happened. so what just happened? who am i anymore? what is my purpose anymore? why am i still here?
Its the 2nd time this week i've worn a dress... scary...

I read everyone's entries and I realize that I have no idea what everyone is talking about. Am I living under a rock? Perhaps... 
Anyway, it's been a pretty cool week (if u subtract the school part which in its entirety keeps draging on and on and on and on) I hung out Jimmy most of the weekend and someday during the week. We went to Starbucks which was yummy. Tomorrow (friday... thank God...) after Jimmy gets off work we are gonna watch/rent a movie. hooray for movies... I haven't seen very many if I really think about it... It's sorta sad and pathetic. I live in a place where there is a place like blockbusters on every corner practically (at least a place where i can get somekind of mooovie) and a tv with God knows how many movie channels and I never watch any movies... it's probably because I'm <i>always<i/> sleeping. 
I love the guitar. I wrote a complete song for <i>The Impatients<i/> and it totally rocks for a first band-made-song if that makes any sense... anyway... i took a quiz on how Jewish are you... my non jewish friend got an 80% where as I, the Jew, got a 55%... I found it quite amusing. I took a 3 and a half hour nap today... it was so incredibly nice... I love to sleep... its soooo sweeeeet. Ok... so thats all I have to say at the moment so... this is Cari and I'm signing off. -<ciao>-

I have found the meaning of life. It is simply the following: The meaning of life is music. Music is the epitome of perfection. Music is my everything.

Ever had that feeling of finding something and then realizing its not what it seems? Yea, well thats people for ya. And thats why I don't like many people. Lastly, that's friends for you. They tell you one thing and do another.

I <3 RICK! It's been a week of hell in our relationship, but after a lot of contemplation, we are still together. I feel it is the right choice. I tried to figure out what is best for me, and whats best for me is to be with him even though I haven't seen him in 5 months... I'm getting tired of people asking me why I'm still with him. And here's my answer "because I love him and things like that just don't matter. it's when I see him that make things worth living for." 
Wiz is over...thank God...It was a lot of fun though. I love Mrs. Ruben, she is so funny and makes me happy even though she yells... a lot. lol. Set strike was exhausting... I we were all at school for 13 long ass hours on a SATURDAY! Well, thanks to the wiz of oz, I know have all my leadership community service hours done! woohoo!
I got a new CD today, the new Lost Prophet cd... which is really good actually... So yay for that! Um... yea... it's been a crappy week but everything is a lot better now. so thats good. things aren't perfect, but i'm used to that... i'm gonna go... but i'll try to write again soon.
CIAO! - Cari

don't know where i left off but i'll start off with Rick and I... next week is our 11 month anniversary... I <3 Rick. Well, my brother got married 2 days ago. thats a funny story. Friday was the bride's maid luncheon, so I a bride's maid went. there was free food and what not yada yada yada... later that day was the wedding rehersal... afterwards was the rehersal dinner, this is where the "fun" began. I knew exactly what i was gonna eat... I tried it a month ago and had my heart set on it. I ate it and it was incredibly good. I had a house salad, salmon in pastry, and creme brulee for dessert.  I knew I ate too much, I always eat waaaaaay too much. I had a tummy ache:( I told my mommy. By the time we got back to the hotel it was between 11 and 11:30... I went right to bed because I wasn't feeling good. I woke up at a little after 6 and started puking my insides out. Keep in mind this is now the day of the wedding. I called my mom and said "mom... i'm throwing up" well she came and brought me 7-up... big mistake... i threw that right up. It was to the point that I had nothing left in my stomach to throw up. I finally had to go get my hair done at 8:45... I felt like CRAP. So... I got my hair done, it was a combo of a Miss Texas pagent winner and some one from the 50s or 60s.... so we left the hair place 
(with my hair that had enough hair spray to be declared a bomb shelter by the gov) we went to Kathleen's house (my now sister-in-law) and got ready... I was weak and shaky.we were getting ready to take a picture when all of a sudden i was like "I gotta go..." I ran to the bathroom where i started throwing up... in the toilet and on my bride's maid dress... perfect, 2 hours before the wedding. luckily it dried... and I made it to the wedding. I have no idea how i made it through the wedding without throwing up or passing out. About 5 minutes before the ceremony was over I broke out into a cold sweat and almost ran out of the church to throw up. Luckily I didn't and made it. My Aunt and her bf, went to get me gatorade and some medicine... which 20 minutes later during the wedding party pictures at the river park I threw up all over my shoes and dress. Luckily my grandma had followed me there just incase something had happened and I needed to go back to the hotel. I laid in bed (except for when I had to throw up) for the next 18 hours... I missed the wedding reception and the wedding brunch the next day. that sucked... I missed the brunch because I was rushed to the emergency room. It was the first time I had ever really gone to the hospital. I was there for several hours. I don't really remember what happened... I got there and they hooked me up to an IV and drew some blood out of my other arm, then I moved to a room right next to it. I was sooo cold I was shaking... they put me in heated blankets but I was so cold they had to put newly heated blankets on me. after the first IV was done they put the anti nausia med in... then put a second iv in... shortly after they put more anti-nausia med in... it wasn't more than 5 minutes later when I started shaking I was so cold, it was to the point I was convulsing... I don't remember what happened after that. i only remember my dad coming and my mom going (switching shifts for the wedding brunch) and the nurse rushing to find something to relax me... thats all i remember... the next thing i knew my dad was asking me some questions of somesort and making me drink gatorade... i was having trouble drinking it... thats when i truely went blank... the next thing I knew I woke up in the car in the garage and someone was helping me to my bed where i slept from 5 or 6pm to 9 the next morning (today) I couldn't go to school today and I'm still really dizzy from all the medicine they gave me at the hospital. I can drink now where as for the past 2 days i couldn't keep anything down. I ate my first solid meal today (a pop tart) i was sooooo hungry. I hadn't had anything to eat since friday night. well... thats about it. hope everyone is better than I am.

So far today I have: gone  to costco, volunteered at the dog party at millpond, sunned by the pool, and exercised. (ain't that amazing, I actually exercised). I'm all sweaty... grrr, and i took a shower this morning too... as lizzie would say "are you one of those girls that showers once a week?" and I would reply "ewww gross no... i shower everyday." but twice a day... thats a lot of effort... grrr... So I guess I'm getting in shape,... what shape... i'm not sure yet...

Jupiter Sunrise = AMAZING.
At their show I was in the front singing their songs at the top of my lungs. Aaron, the bassist was singing to me, it was too cool. And then Mark, the really hot singer at one point looked at me when he was singing, it was sooo sexy I was like HOT DAMN! At the end I got up on the special box thingy and danced, it was so sooo sooooooo cool:) I had a lot of fun. They were sooo great. I <3 them. I had a blast because the entire SSC was there, all 3/3. <3 
I have to volunteer at some dog thing today for my leadership project. I am not looking foreward to it... its at 1:30. grrr...
i don't know why but i'm not having a good day. everything just seems to suck. and its all so frustrating. its to the point where i want to do things that i know i shouldn't.

I think my boyfriend has fallen off the face of the earth.
I got last years yearbook finally, thanks to my mommy.
I worked at my dad's office for almost 4 hours today, folding letters, stuffing envelopes, adding postage, stamping them w/ return addresses, and sticking the sending addresses on... I folded probably around 500 letters, completed probably around the same number. The funny thing is, there is a total of around 2500 letters that need to be sent. But the cool thing is, I'm getting paid, i get to use a cool folding paper machine, and cool stampers, and i get my own office area/ conference room:) I feel special.
I'm falling asleep.... and its not even 8:37pm yet. now it is...
I got my allergy shots today and the lady butchered my left arm! It was bleeding and everything, it turned green in one area and itched like a mofo and got all puffy and shizznick... grrr.
ok... i'm off to bed...
♥

i'm going.

Sparta - collapse = a goooood song. 
I like it a lot.
Jane's Addiction = good
Jets to Brazil = good
Maroon 5 = catchy = good
Good music is hard to come by these days.
In a world filled with synthetic devices and evil marketing people, true music is dying. Music in the 60s and 70s was music. The 60s and the 70s was a time of music and drugs. Whether the music led to the drugs or the drugs led to the music, it doesn't matter at this moment, true music is leaving. Well thats what I think at any rate. I'm not condoning drug use for music. I just write what I think. - Thank you.

I talked to Rick last night, and well I ended up crying myself to sleep. Basically the entire conversation consisted of "are you going to say anything?" and "there is nothing to say." I was so upset about him not calling on valentine's day, that was the one day I expected to hear from him. He said "you know I love you, right?" which then led to me saying "sometimes, I just don't know,Rick." He doesn't always show he cares about me and that he loves me. But deep down I know he does when he acts the way he sometimes acts. I got an e-mail from him that almost made me cry. He appologized and I understood. He said the sweetest things. And I could never stop loving him.

I don't like school.
To top it off I have 4 virtual assignments due at midnight.
Ok, so I could have been working on them for the past week...
But SHH!
I'm mad at Rick.
He didn't call me on Valentine's Day.
So I'm angry.
I'm mad.
I'm hurt.
Sad.
Upset.
Confused.
:(
I have a right to be, right?
Leave me some love and a message...
I have one more virtual assignment to do...
